title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 18 December 2008 - XWiki
content:
xwikibot - (18/12/2008 04:26): XWiki.ltyyan was modified by XWiki.ltyyan (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/ltyyan  
xwikibot - (18/12/2008 08:41): XWiki.ClaudiaJaeger was modified by XWiki.ClaudiaJaeger (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/ClaudiaJaeger  
xwikibot - (18/12/2008 10:00): Macros.HTMLMacro was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol - http://code.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Macros/HTMLMacro  
xwikibot - (18/12/2008 10:00): Macros.XHTMLMacro was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol (deleted document) - http://code.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Macros/XHTMLMacro  
xwikibot - (18/12/2008 10:06): Plugins.DocumentTreePlugin was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol - http://code.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Plugins/DocumentTreePlugin  
xwikibot - (18/12/2008 10:07): Plugins.DocumentTreePlugin was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol (Added comment) - http://code.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Plugins/DocumentTreePlugin  
xwikibot - (18/12/2008 10:10): Main.XWikiSyntax was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol (Updated after XHTML macro removal) - http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/XWikiSyntax  
xwikibot - (18/12/2008 10:10): Main.XWikiSyntax was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol - http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/XWikiSyntax  
xwikibot - (18/12/2008 10:29): Main.I2GcurrikiBuild was modified by xwiki:XWiki.polx (java\_opts added) - http://curriki.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/I2GcurrikiBuild  
asyd - (18/12/2008 10:29): jvdrean: ? :)  
xwikibot - (18/12/2008 11:01): Design.RestfulAPI was modified by xwiki:XWiki.fmancinelli - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/RestfulAPI  
xwikibot - (18/12/2008 11:02): Design.RestfulAPI was modified by xwiki:XWiki.fmancinelli - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/RestfulAPI  
xwikibot - (18/12/2008 11:03): Design.RestfulAPI was modified by xwiki:XWiki.fmancinelli - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/RestfulAPI  
xwikibot - (18/12/2008 11:07): Design.RestfulAPI was modified by xwiki:XWiki.fmancinelli - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/RestfulAPI  
xwikibot - (18/12/2008 11:29): Design.RestfulAPI was modified by xwiki:XWiki.fmancinelli - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/RestfulAPI  
xwikibot - (18/12/2008 11:41): Design.RestfulAPI was modified by xwiki:XWiki.fmancinelli - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/RestfulAPI  
asyd - (18/12/2008 12:07): jvdrean: can you try to write the snippet, for custom display property? :) thanks :)  
asyd - (18/12/2008 12:07): (i just need that to finish my app)  
jvdrean - (18/12/2008 12:16): asyd: http://pastebin.com/m7f05f654  
asyd - (18/12/2008 14:46): jvdrean: thanks!  
asyd - (18/12/2008 15:41): jvdrean: hmm are you sure about the $value ? that works good on edit mode, but not in view mode (the property is not displayed, maybe the property is not save, but I don't think it's the proiblem)  
asyd - (18/12/2008 15:41): ah hmm  
asyd - (18/12/2008 15:42): jvdrean: you forget the name="" in the select\  
jvdrean - (18/12/2008 15:54): asyd: yep I've mixed id and name, I must confess I wrote the snippet from memories, I haven't tried it  
asyd - (18/12/2008 16:12): jvdrean: np it's now working good  
asyd - (18/12/2008 16:13): btw, is there a page where I can help to writes documentations about differents property's fields?  
jvdrean - (18/12/2008 16:13): http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/  
jvdrean - (18/12/2008 16:13): this area is our documentation incubator  
asyd - (18/12/2008 16:14): ok  
asyd - (18/12/2008 16:26): btw, is there a page where I can help to writes documentations about differents property's fields?  
asyd - (18/12/2008 16:26): oups  
asyd - (18/12/2008 16:28): hmm I think I understand  
jvdrean - (18/12/2008 16:37): asyd: you could copy the content of http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/DataModel and improve it in the first place  
asyd - (18/12/2008 16:37): ok  
jvdrean - (18/12/2008 16:38): asyd: once it's done just ping someone from the dev team for a quick review + typo check to get the go for a replacement of the original one  
jvdrean - (18/12/2008 16:38): feel free to create multiple pages if you think it's necessary  
asyd - (18/12/2008 16:41):  hmm strange, since I change the custom display the value I get is " Yes " or " NO " (note the spaces :?)  
jvdrean - (18/12/2008 16:42): could you paste your displayer somewhere ?  
asyd - (18/12/2008 16:43): http://pastealacon.com/1888  
jvdrean - (18/12/2008 16:46): trailing spaces before #else and #end I think  
asyd - (18/12/2008 16:47): hmm ok  
jvdrean - (18/12/2008 16:48): btw you know about the boolean prop that does just what you've done here with a string right ?  
asyd - (18/12/2008 16:49): not sure to understand  
asyd - (18/12/2008 16:50): (the custom display was not really for this property, I just want to avoid the --- value in a boolean property  
jvdrean - (18/12/2008 16:54): so you custom displayer is for a boolean ?  
asyd - (18/12/2008 16:55): no my question was for a string, that I want to edit via a selct, it's working very good  
asyd - (18/12/2008 16:56): but for this boolean property, when the user choose the value, there are "---" "yes" "no" but I didn't find how to avoid the --- value  
jvdrean - (18/12/2008 16:56): I think it will disappear if you put a default value  
jvdrean - (18/12/2008 16:57): (if so its worth a doc update :D )  
asyd - (18/12/2008 16:57): yeah indeed  
asyd - (18/12/2008 16:59): it's works fine, thanks  
gwash - (18/12/2008 19:21): what the policy of adding new tutorials?  
gwash - (18/12/2008 19:23): it's exactly a xwiki function, just a way to get MathML rendering in xwiki pages  
gwash - (18/12/2008 19:23): it's not\*  
xwikibot - (18/12/2008 19:51): XWiki.MartinhoPatricio was modified by XWiki.MartinhoPatricio (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/MartinhoPatricio  
xwikibot - (18/12/2008 20:10): XWiki.Graffo was modified by XWiki.Graffo (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Graffo  
xwikibot - (18/12/2008 21:15): Main.Roadmap was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol (Added XE 1.8 roadmap) - http://enterprise.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/Roadmap  
MadOtis - (18/12/2008 21:41): Hello all... I'm trying to install the WAR version of xwiki (v1.7) on Geronimo.  I get an error while trying to launch it after deployment: DuplicateMappingException: Duplicate class/entity mapping com.xpn.xwiki.doc.XWikiDocument   
MadOtis - (18/12/2008 21:41): It never populates the database.  Any suggestions?  
MadOtis - (18/12/2008 21:51): Anyone?  Anything?
